In order to run Aigilas, you need to have Java Runtime 6 (JRE6) installed.
Please visit Java.com to obtain a copy of the Java runtime.

To start the game, double click the appropriate launch script for your platform.

The gameplay manual is here: https://github.com/XBigTK13X/Aigilas/wiki/Instruction-Manual

Check out the backstory: https://github.com/XBigTK13X/Aigilas/wiki/Backstory

A quick reference of the default controls is here: https://github.com/XBigTK13X/Aigilas/wiki/Command-Quick-Reference

If you encounter any problems, please send a message to tim@simplepathstudios.com

More information can be found at: http://www. aigilas.net.

Source code can be found at: https://github.com/XBigTK13X/Aigilas 

Enjoy!

  -Tim "XBigTK13X" Kretschmer, Founder of Simple Path Studios
